wikipedia_page.main: Michael Sharvell-Martin (2 February 1944 – 28 October 2010) was a popular British television and stage actor whose career spanned more than three decades. He was a familiar character actor on British television screens, guest starring in several prime time dramas and comedies during the 1970s and 1980s.
